pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multilevel B-Spline Approximation // Functions to interpolate irregularly and regularly spaced data using Multilevel B-spline Approximation (MBA). Functions call portions of the SINTEF Multilevel B-spline Library written by yvind Hjelle which implements methods developed by Lee, Wolberg and Shin (1997; doi:10.1109/2945.620490).
